desc.p: Field to indicate whether this transaction will be flagging the position as settled or unsettled.
Only input of 'SETTLE' or 'UNSETTLE' allowed.
Mandatory field.
Unsettled nominal credit
Sub account of the unsettled position
Free format narrative field.
Allows to input the reason the position has been flagged as unsettled. Input of up to 35 characters.
The date that the position should be unsettled from.
Up to 11 type D date characters (Standard Date Format)
Mandatory Field.
The nominee code of the position if the position is held by nominee.
1-5 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) character Nominee.Code.
Must be a valid Nominee.Code
Optional field.
The security number of the stock that will be flagged as settled or unsettled.
Must be the ID of a valid Security.Master file record.
Mandatory Field.
The nominal amount of the stock to be unsettled or settled.
1-18 numeric characters (including up to 6 decimal places).
Mandatory Field.
Unsettled nominal debit
The nominal amount of the stock to be unsettled or settled.
1-18 numeric characters (including up to 6 decimal places).
Mandatory Field.
The number of the portfolio to which the position to be flagged as settled or unsettled belongs.
Standard Sec.Acc.Master id.
Must be an existing Sec.Acc.Master record.
Mandatory Field.
The depository where the position to be flagged as settled or unsettled is held.
1-10 numeric character Customer ID number.
Must be a valid Customer for whom the Customer.Security file record (Field - Customer.Type) equals 'D' (Depository)
Mandatory Field.
The interest rate of the stock if the stock is a Kassenobligationen stock.
0 - 11 Numeric characters.
Optional Field.
Record key.
The maturity date of the stock if the stock is a Kassenobligationen stock.
Up to 11 type D date characters (Standard Date format).
Optional Field.
